projects.name: Spotify Recent Favorites

projects.description: Scientific laser refraction 'sandbox' supporting custom values.

projects.name: Typechase
projects.description: Obvious typeracer copy, so an application for testing and practising typing speed. Supports custom texts but also has a lot of pre-defined ones.

projects.description: Hardwired node.js discord bot for VOIP service Discord. Features custom commands and server management tools.

projects.name: Thonk Paint
projects.description: Novelty web paint with the thinking emoji as the brush. Express your thoughts!
